0.0.2.name: wordpress/mydigipasscom-secure-login
0.0.2.description:
MyDIGIPASS.com enables web developers to add strong user authentication to their Wordpress site, in a cost-efficient and convenient way. Once added, users are able to secure access to their account with strong authentication to avoid account theft. Additionally, you are able to tap into a community of millions of DIGIPASS users out there. Gain extra visibility by adding your site to theMyDIGIPASS.com application eco-system, making it easier to attract new users to read your blog.

For more information, please visit http://developer.mydigipass.com
